description: This test case verifies that all fields in the loan repayment calculator are present, correctly labeled, and function as expected. It ensures that users can enter valid information, receive appropriate error messages for invalid inputs, and see the calculated monthly repayment amount.
testStep: Navigate to the loan repayment calculator page.
Check for the presence of the fields: loan amount, interest rate, and loan term.
Enter valid values in these fields.
Click on the calculate button.
expectedResult: The loan repayment calculator should have fields for loan amount, interest rate, and loan term. The calculated monthly repayment amount should be displayed in a clear and easy-to-read format.

description: This test case verifies that the loan repayment calculator handles invalid inputs correctly. It ensures that appropriate error messages are displayed when invalid values are entered in the fields.
testCaseName: Invalid Input in Loan Repayment Calculator
testStep: Navigate to the loan repayment calculator page.
Enter invalid values in the fields (e.g., negative loan amount, zero interest rate, non-numeric characters in loan term).
Click on the calculate button.
expectedResult: The system should display appropriate error messages for invalid inputs and should not calculate the monthly repayment amount.

description: This test case verifies that the loan repayment calculator calculates the monthly repayment amount correctly based on the specified formula.
testStep: Navigate to the loan repayment calculator page.
Enter valid values in the fields: loan amount, interest rate, and loan term.
Calculate the monthly repayment amount manually using the specified formula.
Compare the calculated value with the value displayed by the system.
expectedResult: The system should calculate the monthly repayment amount correctly based on the specified formula and should display the same value as the manually calculated value.

description: This test case verifies that all fields in the loan calculator are present, correctly labeled, and function as expected. It ensures that users can enter valid information, receive appropriate error messages for invalid inputs, and see the calculated monthly repayment amount for each loan option.
testStep: Navigate to the loan calculator page.
Check for the presence of the fields: loan amount, interest rate, and loan term for each loan option.
Enter valid values for each field.
expectedResult: The loan calculator should have fields for loan amount, interest rate, and loan term for each loan option.

description: This test case ensures that the loan calculator allows users to input values for multiple loan options and see the calculated monthly repayment amount for each option. It verifies that the repayment amounts for each option are displayed in a clear and easy-to-read format.
testStep: Navigate to the loan calculator page.
Enter valid values for the loan amount, interest rate, and loan term for two or more loan options.
expectedResult: The repayment amounts for each option should be displayed in a clear and easy-to-read format.

description: This test case verifies that the loan calculator allows users to compare the repayment amounts for each loan option and make an informed decision about which loan option to choose. It ensures that the repayment amounts for each option are displayed side-by-side for easy comparison.
testStep: Navigate to the loan calculator page.
Enter valid values for the loan amount, interest rate, and loan term for two or more loan options.
Compare the repayment amounts for each option.
expectedResult: The repayment amounts for each option should be displayed side-by-side for easy comparison.

description: This test case verifies that the credit card page displays all available credit card options, their features, benefits, applicable fees, interest rates, and rewards programs. It also ensures that users can compare different credit card options side-by-side.
testStep: 1. Navigate to the credit card page.
2. Check for the presence of all available credit card options.
3. Verify that each credit card option displays its features, benefits, applicable fees, interest rates, and rewards programs.
4. Attempt to compare different credit card options side-by-side.
expectedResult: The credit card page should display all available credit card options, their features, benefits, applicable fees, interest rates, and rewards programs. Users should be able to compare different credit card options side-by-side.

description: This test case verifies that users can select a credit card option that best suits their needs. It ensures that users can view the details of the selected credit card option and proceed with the application process.
testStep: 1. Navigate to the credit card page.
2. Select a credit card option that best suits your needs.
3. Verify that the details of the selected credit card option are displayed.
4. Proceed with the application process.
expectedResult: Users should be able to select a credit card option that best suits their needs, view the details of the selected credit card option, and proceed with the application process.

description: This test case verifies that users can successfully submit a credit card application. It ensures that users can enter valid information, receive appropriate error messages for invalid inputs, and successfully submit the application.
testStep: 1. Navigate to the credit card page.
2. Select a credit card option that best suits your needs.
3. Proceed with the application process.
4. Enter valid information in all required fields.
5. Attempt to submit the application with invalid information.
expectedResult: Users should be able to enter valid information, receive appropriate error messages for invalid inputs, and successfully submit the credit card application.

description: This test case verifies that all fields in the credit card application form are present, correctly labeled, and function as expected. It ensures that users can enter valid information, receive appropriate error messages for invalid inputs, and successfully submit the form.
testStep: Navigate to the credit card application page.
Check for the presence of the fields: name, address, phone number, email, income, and employment status.
expectedResult: The credit card application form should have fields for name, address, phone number, email, income, and employment status.

description: This test case ensures that the user receives a confirmation email after submitting their credit card application. It verifies that the email contains all necessary information and is sent to the correct email address.
testStep: Submit a credit card application.
Check the email associated with the submitted application for a confirmation email.
expectedResult: The user should receive a confirmation email containing all necessary information at the email address provided in the application.

description: This test case verifies that the user receives a decision on their credit card application within a reasonable timeframe. It ensures that the decision is communicated clearly and accurately to the user.
testStep: Submit a credit card application.
Wait for a reasonable timeframe for a decision to be made.
Check for a decision on the credit card application.
expectedResult: The user should receive a clear and accurate decision on their credit card application within a reasonable timeframe.

description: This test case ensures that the user receives information on how to activate and use their new credit card if they are approved. It verifies that the information is communicated clearly and accurately to the user.
testCaseName: Credit Card Activation and Usage Information
testStep: Receive approval for a credit card application.
Check for information on how to activate and use the new credit card.
expectedResult: The user should receive clear and accurate information on how to activate and use their new credit card if they are approved.

description: This test case verifies that the employee's performance review history is displayed on their profile page as per the acceptance criteria.
testStep: 1. Log in as an HR manager.
2. Navigate to the employee's profile page.
3. Check for the presence of the performance review history section.
4. Verify that the section includes the date of the review, the reviewer's name, and the review score.
expectedResult: The employee's performance review history should be displayed on their profile page with the required details.

description: This test case verifies that the HR manager can edit the employee's performance review history as per the acceptance criteria.
testStep: 1. Log in as an HR manager.
2. Navigate to the employee's profile page.
3. Click on the edit button in the performance review history section.
4. Edit the review score or reviewer's name.
5. Save the changes.
6. Verify that the changes are reflected in the performance review history section.
expectedResult: The HR manager should be able to edit the employee's performance review history and the changes should be reflected in the section.

description: This test case verifies that the HR manager can delete a performance review from the employee's history as per the acceptance criteria.
testStep: 1. Log in as an HR manager.
2. Navigate to the employee's profile page.
3. Click on the delete button next to a performance review.
4. Confirm the deletion.
5. Verify that the deleted review is no longer displayed in the performance review history section.
expectedResult: The HR manager should be able to delete a performance review from the employee's history and the deleted review should no longer be displayed in the section.

description: This test case verifies that the performance review history section can be sorted by date, reviewer's name, or review score as per the acceptance criteria.
testStep: 1. Log in as an HR manager.
2. Navigate to the employee's profile page.
3. Click on the sorting dropdown in the performance review history section.
4. Select a sorting option (date, reviewer's name, or review score).
5. Verify that the section is sorted according to the selected option.
expectedResult: The HR manager should be able to sort the performance review history section by date, reviewer's name, or review score and the section should be sorted accordingly.

description: This test case verifies that the HR manager can search for a specific performance review in the employee's history as per the acceptance criteria.
testStep: 1. Log in as an HR manager.
2. Navigate to the employee's profile page.
3. Enter a search term in the search bar in the performance review history section.
4. Verify that the section displays only the performance reviews that match the search term.
expectedResult: The HR manager should be able to search for a specific performance review in the employee's history and the section should display only the matching reviews.

description: This test case verifies that the performance review history section is paginated as per the acceptance criteria.
testStep: 1. Log in as an HR manager.
2. Navigate to the employee's profile page.
3. Verify that the performance review history section is paginated.
4. Click on the next page button.
5. Verify that the next page of performance reviews is displayed.
expectedResult: The performance review history section should be paginated and the HR manager should be able to navigate to the next page of reviews.

testStep: 1. Log in as an HR manager.
2. Navigate to the employee's profile page.
3. Click on the export button in the performance review history section.
4. Verify that the exported file includes the date of the review, the reviewer's name, and the review score.
expectedResult: The HR manager should be able to export the employee's performance review history and the exported file should include the required details.

description: This test case verifies that the benefits management system allows HR administrators to add a new benefits plan. It ensures that the plan is correctly labeled and that all required fields are present and functional.

description: This test case verifies that the benefits management system allows HR administrators to edit an existing benefits plan. It ensures that the plan is correctly labeled and that all required fields are present and functional.

2. Navigate to the disciplinary action templates section.
3. Select the desired filters, such as job role and department.
4. Click on the "Search" button.
5. Verify that the system displays all relevant templates based on the selected filters.
expectedResult: The system should display all relevant templates based on the selected filters.

description: This test case verifies that the Cloud HCM Expansion module allows for easy editing of disciplinary action templates for different job roles and departments. It ensures that the system correctly captures all necessary information and saves it in the appropriate format.
testStep: 1. Log in to the Cloud HCM Expansion module as a manager.
2. Navigate to the disciplinary action templates section.
3. Select the template to be edited.
4. Click on the "Edit" button.
5. Make the necessary changes to the template.
6. Save the changes.
expectedResult: The system should save the changes made to the template and display a success message.

description: This test case verifies that the Cloud HCM Expansion module allows for easy deletion of disciplinary action templates for different job roles and departments. It ensures that the system correctly removes the template from the database.
testStep: 1. Log in to the Cloud HCM Expansion module as a manager.
2. Navigate to the disciplinary action templates section.
3. Select the template to be deleted.
4. Click on the "Delete" button.
5. Confirm the deletion.
expectedResult: The system should remove the template from the database and display a success message.

description: This test case verifies that the Cloud HCM Expansion module allows for easy tracking of employee behavior through disciplinary actions. It ensures that the system correctly captures all necessary information and displays it in a user-friendly format.
testStep: 1. Log in to the Cloud HCM Expansion module as a manager.
2. Navigate to the disciplinary actions section.
3. Select the disciplinary action to view the details.
4. Verify that the system displays all relevant information, including employee name, behavior description, and consequences.
expectedResult: The system should display all relevant information related to the disciplinary action in a user-friendly format.

description: This test case verifies that the Cloud HCM Expansion module allows for easy management of consequences for employee behavior. It ensures that the system correctly captures all necessary information and displays it in a user-friendly format.
testStep: 1. Log in to the Cloud HCM Expansion module as a manager.
2. Navigate to the disciplinary actions section.
3. Select the disciplinary action to view the details.
4. Verify that the system displays all relevant information related to the consequences, including the type of consequence and the date it was implemented.
expectedResult: The system should display all relevant information related to the consequences in a user-friendly format.

description: This test case verifies that all required fields in the job posting form are present, correctly labeled, and function as expected. It ensures that recruiters can enter valid information, receive appropriate error messages for invalid inputs, and successfully post a job opening.
testStep: Navigate to the job posting form.
Check for the presence of the fields: job title, job description, required qualifications, and application instructions.
expectedResult: The job posting form should have fields for job title, job description, required qualifications, and application instructions.

description: This test case ensures that the job posting is visible to all potential candidates on the Taleo platform. It verifies that the job posting is displayed in the appropriate location and can be easily accessed by candidates.
testStep: Navigate to the Taleo platform.
Search for the posted job opening.
expectedResult: The job posting should be visible to all potential candidates on the Taleo platform and easily accessible.

description: This test case verifies that the recruiter can edit a posted job opening. It ensures that the job posting can be updated with new information or changes to the requirements.
testStep: Navigate to the posted job opening.
Click on the edit button.
Make changes to the job posting.
expectedResult: The job posting should be successfully updated with the new information.

description: This test case verifies that the recruiter can delete a posted job opening. It ensures that the job posting can be removed from the Taleo platform.
testStep: Navigate to the posted job opening.
Click on the delete button.
Confirm the deletion.
expectedResult: The job posting should be successfully deleted from the Taleo platform.

description: This test case verifies that the job posting form enforces the required fields validation. It ensures that recruiters cannot post a job opening without filling in all the required fields.
testStep: Navigate to the job posting form.
Leave one or more required fields blank.
Attempt to submit the job posting form.
expectedResult: The system should not allow the form submission and should display a message indicating that the required fields are missing.

description: This test case verifies that the job title field in the job posting form enforces the specified validation. It ensures that recruiters must enter a job title that meets the criteria for length and character types.
testStep: Navigate to the job posting form.
Enter a job title that is less than 5 characters long or contains invalid characters.
Attempt to submit the job posting form.
expectedResult: The system should not allow the form submission and should display a message indicating that the job title does not meet the requirements.

description: This test case verifies that the job description field in the job posting form enforces the specified validation. It ensures that recruiters must enter a job description that meets the criteria for length and content.
testStep: Navigate to the job posting form.
Enter a job description that is less than 50 characters long or contains inappropriate content.
Attempt to submit the job posting form.
expectedResult: The system should not allow the form submission and should display a message indicating that the job description does not meet the requirements.

description: This test case verifies that the required qualifications field in the job posting form enforces the specified validation. It ensures that recruiters must enter required qualifications that meet the criteria for length and content.
testStep: Navigate to the job posting form.
Enter required qualifications that are less than 50 characters long or contain inappropriate content.
Attempt to submit the job posting form.
expectedResult: The system should not allow the form submission and should display a message indicating that the required qualifications do not meet the requirements.

description: This test case verifies that the application instructions field in the job posting form enforces the specified validation. It ensures that recruiters must enter application instructions that meet the criteria for length and content.
testStep: Navigate to the job posting form.
Enter application instructions that are less than 50 characters long or contain inappropriate content.
Attempt to submit the job posting form.
expectedResult: The system should not allow the form submission and should display a message indicating that the application instructions do not meet the requirements.

description: This test case verifies that the recruiter can cancel a job posting before submitting it. It ensures that the job posting is not saved as a draft or posted to the Taleo platform.
testStep: Navigate to the job posting form.
Fill in some of the fields.
Click on the cancel button.
expectedResult: The job posting should be successfully cancelled and not saved as a draft or posted to the Taleo platform.

description: This test case verifies that the job search function allows candidates to search for job openings by job title. It ensures that the search results display relevant job openings with job titles, locations, and brief descriptions.

description: This test case verifies that appropriate error messages are displayed when an invalid search term is entered. It ensures that users are informed when their search term does not match any job openings.

2. Click on the job search function.
3. Enter an invalid search term in the search bar.
4. Click on the search button.
expectedResult: The system should display an error message indicating that no job openings match the search term.

2. Click on the job search function.
3. Leave the search bar blank.
4. Click on the search button.
expectedResult: The system should display an error message indicating that a search term is required to find job openings.

2. Click on the job search function.

description: This test case verifies that the email notification system is customizable with different templates and messages. It ensures that recruiters can create and save multiple templates for different stages of the recruitment process.
testStep: 1. Navigate to the email notification system.
2. Check for the presence of the option to create a new email template.
3. Create a new email template with a unique subject and message.
4. Save the template.
5. Verify that the new template is listed in the email template options.
expectedResult: The system should allow recruiters to create and save multiple email templates for different stages of the recruitment process.

description: This test case verifies that the email notifications are triggered by different stages of the recruitment process, such as application received, interview scheduled, and offer extended. It ensures that candidates receive timely and relevant updates about their application status.
testStep: 1. Navigate to the recruitment process.
2. Move a candidate through different stages of the process, such as application received, interview scheduled, and offer extended.
3. Verify that an email notification is triggered for each stage.
4. Check the content of the email notification to ensure that it includes relevant information about the job opening and the candidate's application status.
expectedResult: The system should trigger email notifications for different stages of the recruitment process and include relevant information about the job opening and the candidate's application status.

description: This test case verifies that the email notifications include relevant information about the job opening and the candidate's application status. It ensures that candidates receive accurate and complete information about their application status.
testStep: 1. Navigate to the email notification system.
2. Check the content of the email notifications triggered by different stages of the recruitment process.
3. Verify that the email notifications include relevant information about the job opening, such as job title, location, and salary range.
4. Verify that the email notifications include accurate and complete information about the candidate's application status, such as application status, interview schedule, and offer details.
expectedResult: The email notifications should include relevant and accurate information about the job opening and the candidate's application status.

description: This test case verifies that the email notifications can be personalized with candidate-specific information. It ensures that candidates receive personalized and engaging updates about their application status.
testStep: 1. Navigate to the email notification system.
2. Check for the presence of the option to personalize email notifications with candidate-specific information, such as name and application status.
3. Create a new email template with personalized information.
4. Trigger the email notification for a candidate.
5. Verify that the email notification includes personalized information.
expectedResult: The email notifications should allow recruiters to personalize the content with candidate-specific information.

description: This test case verifies that the email notifications are delivered to the correct email address. It ensures that candidates receive email notifications at the correct email address and do not miss any updates about their application status.
testStep: 1. Navigate to the email notification system.
2. Trigger the email notification for a candidate.
3. Verify that the email notification is delivered to the correct email address associated with the candidate's account.
expectedResult: The email notifications should be delivered to the correct email address associated with the candidate's account.

description: This test case verifies that the email notifications are sent at an appropriate frequency. It ensures that candidates do not receive too many or too few email notifications about their application status.
testStep: 1. Navigate to the email notification system.
2. Trigger the email notification for a candidate.
3. Verify that the email notification is sent at an appropriate frequency, such as once a day or once a week.
expectedResult: The email notifications should be sent at an appropriate frequency to avoid overwhelming or neglecting candidates.

description: This test case verifies that candidates can unsubscribe from email notifications. It ensures that candidates have control over their email preferences and do not receive unwanted email notifications.
testStep: 1. Navigate to the email notification system.
2. Check for the presence of the option to unsubscribe from email notifications.
3. Unsubscribe a candidate from email notifications.
4. Trigger the email notification for the unsubscribed candidate.
5. Verify that the email notification is not sent to the unsubscribed candidate.
expectedResult: Candidates should be able to unsubscribe from email notifications and should not receive unwanted email notifications.

description: This test case verifies that the email notification system handles errors gracefully. It ensures that the system does not crash or display confusing error messages when errors occur.
testStep: 1. Navigate to the email notification system.
2. Trigger an email notification with invalid input, such as an invalid email address or template.
3. Verify that the system displays an appropriate error message and does not crash.
expectedResult: The email notification system should handle errors gracefully and display appropriate error messages.

description: This test case verifies that the email notification system is secure and protects candidate information. It ensures that candidate information is not leaked or compromised through the email notification system.
testStep: 1. Navigate to the email notification system.
2. Check for the presence of security measures, such as encryption and access control.
3. Trigger an email notification for a candidate.
4. Verify that the email notification does not contain sensitive information, such as passwords or personal identification numbers.
expectedResult: The email notification system should be secure and protect candidate information from unauthorized access or leakage.

description: This test case verifies that the email notification system performs well under different loads and conditions. It ensures that the system can handle a large number of email notifications and does not slow down or crash.
testStep: 1. Navigate to the email notification system.
2. Trigger a large number of email notifications, such as 1000 or more.
3. Verify that the system can handle the load and does not slow down or crash.
expectedResult: The email notification system should perform well under different loads and conditions and should not slow down or crash.

description: This test case verifies that candidates can create job alerts based on job title, location, and keywords. It ensures that the email notification system allows candidates to set up job alerts and saves their preferences correctly.
testStep: 1. Navigate to the job alert creation page.
2. Enter job title, location, and keywords.
3. Select the frequency and delivery options for email notifications.

2. Wait for email notifications to arrive.
3. Check the email notifications for relevant job openings with job titles, locations, and brief descriptions.

description: This test case verifies that the recruitment metrics dashboard displays key performance indicators such as time-to-hire, cost-per-hire, and applicant-to-hire ratio. It ensures that the dashboard is accurate and up-to-date.

3. Check that the dashboard displays time-to-hire, cost-per-hire, and applicant-to-hire ratio.

description: This test case ensures that the recruitment metrics dashboard allows the recruiter to filter and drill down into specific job openings, locations, and time periods. It verifies that the filtering functionality is working as expected.

description: This test case verifies that the time-to-hire calculation on the recruitment metrics dashboard is accurate and reflects the actual time it takes to hire a candidate. It ensures that the calculation is working as expected.
testStep: 1. Log in to the Taleo platform as a recruiter.
2. Navigate to the recruitment metrics dashboard.
3. Check the time-to-hire calculation for a specific job opening.
4. Calculate the actual time it took to hire a candidate for that job opening.
5. Compare the actual time with the time-to-hire calculation on the dashboard.
expectedResult: The time-to-hire calculation on the recruitment metrics dashboard should be accurate and reflect the actual time it takes to hire a candidate.

description: This test case verifies that the cost-per-hire calculation on the recruitment metrics dashboard is accurate and reflects the actual cost of hiring a candidate. It ensures that the calculation is working as expected.
testStep: 1. Log in to the Taleo platform as a recruiter.

2. Perform a job search using different criteria such as job title, location, and salary range.
3. Apply different filters such as job type, experience level, and education level.
4. Verify that the search results are accurate and relevant.
expectedResult: The job search functionality should work correctly, and the search results should be accurate and relevant.

description: This test case verifies that the job application process on the Taleo platform works correctly. It ensures that users can apply for jobs easily and that the application process is straightforward and intuitive.
testStep: 1. Access the Taleo platform.
2. Perform a job search and select a job to apply for.
3. Fill out the job application form with valid information.
4. Submit the job application.
expectedResult: The job application process should work correctly, and the user should receive a confirmation message indicating that the application was submitted successfully.

description: This test case verifies that users can upload their resumes to the Taleo platform. It ensures that the resume upload functionality works correctly and that users can attach their resumes in different formats such as PDF, Word, or TXT.
testStep: 1. Access the Taleo platform.
2. Perform a job search and select a job to apply for.
3. Fill out the job application form and attach a resume in different formats such as PDF, Word, or TXT.
4. Submit the job application.
expectedResult: The resume upload functionality should work correctly, and the user should receive a confirmation message indicating that the application was submitted successfully.

description: This test case verifies that users can track the status of their job applications on the Taleo platform. It ensures that users can view the status of their applications, such as whether they are under review, rejected, or accepted.
testStep: 1. Access the Taleo platform.
2. Apply for a job.
3. Navigate to the application status page.
4. Verify that the status of the application is displayed correctly.
expectedResult: Users should be able to track the status of their job applications on the Taleo platform, with accurate and up-to-date information.

description: This test case verifies that users can create an account on the Taleo platform. It ensures that the account creation process is straightforward and intuitive, and that users can log in and access their account information easily.

3. Fill out the account creation form with valid information.

description: This test case verifies that users can reset their passwords on the Taleo platform. It ensures that the password reset process is straightforward and intuitive, and that users can regain access to their accounts easily.

2. Click on the "Forgot Password" link.
3. Enter the email address associated with the account.

description: This test case verifies that users can log out of their accounts on the Taleo platform. It ensures that the logout functionality works correctly and that users can end their sessions securely.
testStep: 1. Access the Taleo platform and log in to the account.
2. Click on the "Logout" button.
3. Verify that the user is logged out and cannot access any account information.
